definition: periodic table (chemistry)/abbr. of 元素週期表|元素周期表[yuan2 su4 zhou1 qi1 biao3], periodic table of the elements
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Why do we call it the Periodic Table?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我们叫它周期表？

sentences.english: On the right side of the Periodic Table.
sentences.chinese: 元素周期表的右半部分。

sentences.english: And we can go on and on down the table.
sentences.chinese: 而且我们可以继续沿着周期表往下走。

sentences.english: Technetium is number 43 on the periodic table.
sentences.chinese: 锝是元素周期表中第43号元素。

sentences.english: If you didn't get a Periodic Table, swing by the office.
sentences.chinese: 如果你们还没有周期表，可以到办公室来。

sentences.english: Donors are over here, the metals on the left end of the Periodic Table.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，在元素周期表的左下部分的金属。

sentences.english: She gave him a miniature copy of the periodic table of elements.
sentences.chinese: 她给了奥巴马一个元素周期表的微型复制品。

sentences.english: Thursday will be the Periodic Table quiz.
Pick something about the Periodic Table.
sentences.chinese: 选个关于元素周期表的东西。

sentences.english: According to Mendeleyev's periodic table , there seem to be still some elements undiscovered yet .
sentences.chinese: 按照门捷列夫周期表，似乎还有一些元素尚未发现。

sentences.english: Everybody please take out a piece of paper and write the periodic table from memory.
sentences.chinese: 请大家拿出一张纸，默写化学元素周期表。

sentences.english: You will be asked to write down the periodic table.
If you click on Periodic Table, you can get a variety of choices.
sentences.chinese: 如果你点击周期表，你可以得到许多的选择。

sentences.english: The six noble gases are found in the far right column of the periodic table.
sentences.chinese: 六种稀有气体在元素周期表的最右侧。

sentences.english: So, up here, atomic theory, periodic table, bonding, structures and molecules.
sentences.chinese: 原子理论，元素周期表，价键，分子结构。

definition: lit. zero group/another word for the inert or noble gases 惰性氣體|惰性气体
alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)

actinoids (rare earth series), namely: actinium Ac89 錒|锕[a1], thorium Th90 釷|钍[tu3], protoactinium Pa91 鏷|镤[pu2], uranium U92 鈾|铀[you2], neptunium Ne93 鎿|镎[na2], plutonium Pu94 鈈|钚[bu4], americium Am95 鎇|镅[mei2], curium Cm96 鋦|锔[ju2], berkelium Bk97 錇|锫[pei2], californium Cf98 鐦|锎[kai1], einsteinium Es99 鎄|锿[ai1], fermium Fm100 鐨|镄[fei4], mendelevium Md101 鍆|钔[men2], nobelium No102 鍩|锘[nuo4], lawrencium Lr103 鐒|铹[lao2]

lanthanoid (rare earth series), namely: lanthanum La57 鑭|镧[lan2], cerium Ce58 鈰|铈[shi4], praseodymium Pr59 鐠|镨[pu3], neodymium Nd60 釹|钕[nu:3], promethium Pm61 鉕|钷[po3], samarium Sm62 釤|钐[shan1], europium Eu63 銪|铕[you3], gadolinium Gd64 釓|钆[ga2], terbium Tb65 鋱|铽[te4], dysprosium Dy66 鏑|镝[di1], holmium Ho67 鈥|钬[huo3], erbium Er68 鉺|铒[er3], thulium Tm69 銩|铥[diu1], ytterbium Yb70 鐿|镱[yi4], lutetium Lu71 鑥|镥[lu3]
